p.span: Kokomo Schools welcomes you to our website! We encourage you to take some time to familiarize yourself with the navigation tools, as well as our special features. Kokomo School Corporation officials hope you find many valuable resources for parents, staff, and KSC stakeholders.

div.span: For information on "eLearning" and access to support resources for students and families, please click on the links below. We will continue to update our site as new information becomes available.

ul.li: Master Teacher Contract Tentative Agreement (Click Here)

p.span: Greetings from Kokomo Schools! The times continue to be exciting for our schools and our community. I am proud of the work being done by our teachers and staff as our school corporation continues to move forward.

Your school leaders – including Board members, administrators, and teachers – have spent many hours during my tenure studying some of the top programs and schools in the world. We believe the time is well spent because we recognize the need to provide a range of programs and options, as well as outstanding facilities for our students and parents.

In recent years, the seeds planted during that research have resulted in International Baccalaureate (IB) World schools, Integrated Arts schools, state-certified STEM schools, Technology Academies, early childhood expansion with preschool programs at 5 of our 7 elementary schools, and Career schools … all these programs are bearing academic fruit. The corporation’s facility projects, including new learning spaces and three renovated cafeterias, give both our alumni and current students great pride.
Thank you for your continued support of Kokomo Schools. Go Kats!
